Line 51: Line 51:
====July 31====
====July 31====
  +
[[File:Ramadan Massacre.gif|thumb|Ramadan Massacre by [[Carlos Latuff]].]]
On the eve of [[Ramadan]], Syria witnessed the bloodiest day in its 139-day uprising against the single-party regime, in which the [[Alawi]]-run government has allegedly targeted [[Sunni]], [[Druze]] and [[Christian]] groups from across the country.<ref name="gulfnews1">{{cite web|url=http://gulfnews.com/news/region/syria/ramadan-eve-massacre-in-syria-1.845638 |title=Ramadan eve massacre in Syria |publisher=gulfnews |date= |accessdate=2011-08-02}}</ref>
On the eve of [[Ramadan]], Syria witnessed the bloodiest day in its 139-day uprising against the single-party regime, in which the [[Alawi]]-run government has allegedly targeted [[Sunni]], [[Druze]] and [[Christian]] groups from across the country.<ref name="gulfnews1">{{cite web|url=http://gulfnews.com/news/region/syria/ramadan-eve-massacre-in-syria-1.845638 |title=Ramadan eve massacre in Syria |publisher=gulfnews |date= |accessdate=2011-08-02}}</ref>
